event_text: After a long search, m_c is found and killed where they stand.

m_c.kit_thought: Is unsure why {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent hasn't come back.

event_text: m_c was found near c_n territory and driven far out of the surrounding lands.

m_c.kit_thought: Is unsure why {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent hasn't come back.

event_text: m_c was found and invited into the Clan.

m_c.new_thought: Is curious about the Clan that sought {PRONOUN/m_c/object} out
m_c.kit_thought: Is curious about the new place {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} in

event_text: m_c was found and invited back into the Clan.

m_c.new_thought: Is curious why the Clan has allowed {PRONOUN/m_c/object} back
m_c.kit_thought: Is curious why {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} been brought here

event_text: m_c was found and brought back to the safety of the Clan

m_c.kit_thought: Is curious about the new place {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} in
